text: As #COVID19 year fades, #energy surges. #Brent #CrudeOil at pre-pandemic $50/b, #LNG at 2yr highs of $9/mBtu; even unloved #coal at mid-2019 highs of almost $80/t. Seems driven by #vaccine hopes & #China recovery. Still, overblown given ongoing global demand weakness? #OOTT #ONGT https://t.co/vwG0RjKDhg
